messages.content: Are you tired of politics that doesn't deliver for ordinary people? The same old politicians making the same old promises.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote in the ballot box for the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives this time.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want a Britain that's different. A Britain where we have more police on our streets to keep us safe. A Britain where our Armed Forces get the pay and equipment they need. A Britain where ordinary people aren't taxed to the hilt while millionaires can dodge taxes altogether.

images.caption: In many parts of Britain, it's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Don't forget, in many parts of Britain Labour canâ€™t win. Only a vote for the Liberal Democrats can stop the Conservatives.
